main.name: Binisha Shrestha
main.bio: I am passionate about creating impactful software that makes a difference. My expertise lies in developing software solutions for a diverse range of clients, including individuals, small enterprises, and major corporations. Over the years, I have gained experience in software development, mobile app development, front-end/back-end web development, and database/server administration.

work.description: Created a Java app for coal ash analysis, handling data calculation, GUI deployment, and using core Java, SQL, Spring Boot, Hibernate, and Git for precise predictions.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Naz must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
